snippet.title: Hugo 2: Whodunit? Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Hugo 2: Whodunit? continues the story of Hugo and Penelope. This time they visit there Great Uncle at his mansion only to find he's been murdered and Hugo goes missing. Penelope must look for clues to find the murderer before anyone else is killed.
Walkthrough: http://gamerwalkthroughs.com/hugo-2-whodunit/
